applications.notes: Phone screen scheduled for next week

emails.subject: Interview Invite — Acme Robotics
emails.snippet: We'd love to chat about your application for the ML Engineer Intern position. Please let us know your availability for a phone screen next week.
emails.body_text:
Hi there,

Thank you for your application to the ML Engineer Intern position at Acme Robotics. We were impressed by your background and would love to schedule a preliminary phone screen.

Please reply with 2-3 time slots that work for you next week.

Best regards,
Acme Recruiting Team

emails.subject: Offer Details — NeoFinTech
emails.snippet: Congrats! Here's your offer for the Data Engineer position. Please review and let us know if you have any questions.
emails.body_text:
Congratulations!

We are pleased to extend you an offer for the Data Engineer position at NeoFinTech.

Please find the attached offer letter with full details including compensation, benefits, and start date.

We're excited to have you join the team!

Best,
NeoFinTech HR

emails.subject: Application Received - CloudScale Inc
emails.snippet: Thank you for applying to CloudScale Inc. We have received your application for Backend Engineer and will review it shortly.
emails.body_text:
Thank you for your interest in CloudScale Inc!

We have received your application for the Backend Engineer position. Our team will review your materials and reach out if there's a good fit.

Typically, you can expect to hear from us within 2 weeks.

Thank you,
CloudScale Talent Team

emails.subject: Re: Your Application - DataViz Solutions
emails.snippet: Thank you for your interest in DataViz Solutions. Unfortunately, we have decided to move forward with other candidates at this time.
emails.body_text:
Dear Applicant,

Thank you for taking the time to apply for the Full Stack Developer position at DataViz Solutions.

After careful consideration, we have decided to move forward with candidates whose experience more closely aligns with our current needs. We were impressed with your background and encourage you to apply for future openings.

We wish you all the best in your job search.

Sincerely,
DataViz Recruiting
